heading: Tamil Nadu State Board Class 11 – Foundation for Higher Secondary Education
subHeading: Build strong academic fundamentals with the Samacheer Kalvi Class 11 curriculum designed by the Tamil Nadu State Board.
quickIntro: Tamil Nadu State Board Class 11 serves as the first year of higher secondary education, focusing on concept-building across science, commerce, and humanities streams.

examOverview.board: Tamil Nadu State Board (Directorate of Government Examinations, Tamil Nadu)
examOverview.assessmentPattern: Theory examinations with practical and internal assessments for applicable subjects
examOverview.academicPurpose: Prepares students for Class 12 board exams and competitive entrance examinations

evaluationScheme.theory: Written examinations conducted at the end of the academic year
evaluationScheme.practical: Practical examinations for science and computer-based subjects
evaluationScheme.internalAssessment: Periodic tests, assignments, and practical records

futurePathways: Engineering and Medical Entrance Exams (JEE, NEET – foundation level)
